mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NUMBER, B.BOARD_TYPE, B.BOARD_TITLE, -- 제목 U.USER_NICKNAME, -- 작성자 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DR_GOOD G WHERE G.BOARD_NUMBER = B.BOARD_NUMBER) AS GOOD_COUNT, -- 추천수 TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOARD_WRITE_DATE -- 작성일을 문자열로 변환 FROM DR_BOARD B JOIN DR_USER U ON B.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER WHERE B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' AND B.BOARD_TYPE = #{searchType}

SELECT R.RECIPE_NUMBER, R.RECIPE_TYPE, R.RECIPE_TITLE, -- 제목 U.USER_NICKNAME, -- 작성자 TO_CHAR(R.RECIPE_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RECIPE_WRITE_DATE, -- 작성일을 문자열로 변환 P.PHOTO_LOCAL, -- 썸네일 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DR_GOOD G WHERE G.RECIPE_NUMBER = R.RECIPE_NUMBER) AS GOOD_COUNT -- 추천수 FROM DR_RECIPE R JOIN DR_USER U ON R.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PHOTO_LOCAL, RECIPE_NUMBER, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY RECIPE_NUMBER ORDER BY PHOTO_NUMBER) AS RN FROM DR_PHOTO ) P ON R.RECIPE_NUMBER = P.RECIPE_NUMBER AND P.RN = 1 -- 첫 번째 썸네일만 가져오기 WHERE R.RECIPE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' AND R.RECIPE_TYPE = #{searchType}
